name: BreakingSwords
description:
- Breaking sword is a prototype for the 1 week game jam for the GJL Game Parade Summer 2021.

- With the theme of One-Time Use, I created a first person, melee combat game with a sword that breaks after one hit, which is then thrown as a ranged attack, after that, the player is made to scramble around and pick up new swords to use. Mixing in with a parry system to protect yourself and a directional swing, with a parkour system of ledge climbing and wall running for greater mobility.

- Features 2 simple levels and 3 enemy types, (standard swordsman, sniper, elite swordsman)

- A short prototype, playtime of 10 minutes
